Package ca.phon.query.db.xml

Class XMLQuery

java.lang.Object
ca.phon.query.db.xml.XMLQuery
All Implemented Interfaces:
Query, JAXBWrapper<QueryType>
Direct Known Subclasses:
XMLLazyQuery
public class XMLQuery extends Object implements Query, JAXBWrapper<QueryType>
XML-based implementation of Query.
